rules_text: Whenever Black Arts Admiral becomes tapped, mill two cards, then you may pay {B} and sacrifice another creature. When you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: [i]“A pin here, a prick there. Your body sails the Three Seas with Crain, but your soul rests with me at the bottom of the briny gulch.”[/i]
notes:
!u

UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
